title: [1.6.2-1.6.2][ssp][转载]自动加入公共服务期Mod！让你摆脱单身!
author: xhngjss
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xhngjss 于 2013-10-6 22:06 编辑 

大家好，我是xhngjss，今天我向大家隆重介绍个非常实用的Mod！自动加入公共服务器Mod！
顾名思义，它的作用就快速便捷地加入公共服务器!
好吧，我知道没图你们是不信的：





You can edit the properties directly in the “AutoJoin.cfg” file found in your config folder OR you can use the Auto Join Properties GUI screen
If you seem to miss open slots when they are open, try lowering your PingDelay (minimum is .1 seconds)
If you seem to be getting errors (“End of Stream”) errors continuously (back-to-back), try increasing your ErrorDelay
The JoinOffset setting can be change to accommodate servers with “lying” slot numbers
​For instance, MineZ normally has 5 slots reserved for admins, meaning that AutoJoin will always try to join even though it is technically full
To counter-act this, simply set the JoinOffset to -5
The formula is:
Try to Connect to the server when: (#Players Online < #Max Players + JoinOffset)
原文我懒得翻译了，我只知道能在config\AutoJoin.cfg里面设置
此mod还需要GUILib Mod
传送门：http://www.9minecraft.net/davidees-gui-library-mod/
当你Java Read time Out的时候Auto Join的界面就会出来了,具体的用法原文也没有说明
其他的大家自行探索吧
下载地址：1.6.4
http://www.dl2.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1380936243                              http://www.dl.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=13809608621.6.2
http://www.dl.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1375645658
http://www.dl5.9minecraft.net/index.php?act=dl&id=1375646259

第一次转载mod，求不坑！

replies.author: Darkyoooooo
replies.txt_content: 外国大部分服务器都开正版验证吧?不是正版用这个Mod等于无效
